name: Deadly Shadows
description:
Story: You play a boy named Heny. He has moved into a new apartment, but what he doesn't know is that the building is full of shadow spirits stealing the shadows of others. Heny's shadow was also stolen, he has until sunrise to save his shadow in order not to die from the light of the sun.

Controlls:

A and D for move and Space for a jump ( you can jump 2 times in a row )

Credits:
